author: kevingangzi
content:
Restore Old Photos â€“ Bring Precious Memories Back to Life

Introduction: When Memories Fade, the Pain Stays
We all have that one photo â€” a blurry snapshot of our childhood, a creased wedding portrait of our grandparents, or a sun-damaged image of a family gathering long ago. These photos hold more than just pixels or paper; they hold stories, people, and pieces of ourselves.
As time passes, these memories fade â€” both in our minds and in the photos themselves. One user shared, â€œThis was the only photo I had of my grandparents. It broke my heart to see it falling apart.â€
Restoring old photos isnâ€™t just about improving image quality â€” itâ€™s about preserving family, history, and the emotions that come with them. It's about bringing memories back to life.

Why Old Photos Deteriorate Over Time

Photos are more fragile than we often realize. The passage of time, combined with environmental conditions, can cause significant damage. Sunlight fades colors. Humidity leads to mold and stains. Constant handling causes scratches, tears, and folds. Even the ink and paper themselves break down with age.
And the worst part? Once these details are gone, they may be lost forever.
Thatâ€™s why digital photo restoration is so powerful â€” it stops the damage in its tracks and brings back what once seemed lost.

What Is Photo Restoration? (And Why Itâ€™s Not Just for Professionals)

Photo restoration is the process of repairing and enhancing old or damaged photographs. It includes fixing tears, removing stains, sharpening faded faces, and sometimes even adding natural-looking color to black-and-white photos.
In the past, this required hours of manual editing by professionals using complex software. But today, thanks to AI-powered tools like Restore Old Photos, anyone can restore a photo in seconds â€” no experience needed.
Itâ€™s fast, affordable, and accessible. All you need is a digital image and a few clicks.

How to Restore Old Photos Online â€“ Step-by-Step

Restoring your old photos is easier than you might think. Here's how it works:

Scan or photograph your damaged photo â€“ Use a scanner or smartphone to digitize your image.
Upload it to the Restore Old Photos tool â€“ Just drag and drop, no signup required.
Let AI do the work â€“ Our technology analyzes your image, removes damage, enhances details, and restores clarity.
Download your restored version instantly â€“ Get a high-quality restored image in seconds.
Optional: Print or share with family â€“ Surprise your loved ones or create a heartfelt gift.


Before and After Examples That Will Amaze You

Nothing speaks louder than results. Imagine a faded portrait from the 1950s â€” cracked edges, dull eyes, missing background. Now imagine it restored: crisp details, natural skin tones, every feature glowing with life again.
One user restored her parentsâ€™ wedding photo from 1962 and said, â€œI cried when I saw it. It was like seeing them again for the first time.â€
Every photo has a story. Every restoration brings that story back into focus.

Top Reasons to Restore Your Old Photos Today

Reconnect with loved ones â€“ See forgotten faces and moments clearly again.
Preserve your family history â€“ Ensure your heritage is not lost to time.
Create meaningful gifts â€“ A restored photo makes a priceless birthday or anniversary surprise.
Peace of mind â€“ Knowing youâ€™ve saved something irreplaceable for future generations.



FAQ â€“ Common Questions About Restoring Old Photos
Q: Can you restore extremely damaged photos?
A: Yes! While results vary, many heavily damaged photos can be dramatically improved with AI restoration.
Q: Does it work for black and white or sepia images?
A: Absolutely. The tool supports all kinds of photo formats, including old monochrome photos.
Q: Is colorization included?
A: Some tools include optional colorization â€” check the feature list for details.
Q: Will my original photo be changed?
A: No. Your original image stays untouched. The restoration is a digital copy.

Conclusion: Give Your Memories a Second Life
Your photos tell your story. They deserve to be seen, remembered, and shared â€” not hidden in a drawer or left to fade.
With tools like Restore Old Photos, you can protect those memories, honor your family legacy, and relive the most meaningful moments of your life.
Donâ€™t wait until itâ€™s too late.
Try Restore Old Photos today and bring your precious memories back to life.

ğŸ”§ è°ƒè¯•å·¥å…·ï¼šå®æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤º FPSã€ç²¾çµæ•°é‡ç­‰è°ƒè¯•ä¿¡æ¯

from scrawl import Game, Scene, Sprite, Cat, as_main

# åˆ›å»ºæ¸¸æˆå®ä¾‹
game = Game()

class MyCat(Cat):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

    @as_main
    def main1(self):
        while True:
            self.walk()
            yield 500
            

# å®šä¹‰åœºæ™¯
class MyScene(Scene):

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

        # æ·»åŠ ç²¾çµ
        cat = MyCat()
        self.add_sprite(cat)


# è¿è¡Œæ¸¸æˆ
game.set_scene(MyScene())
game.run()

from scrawl import *
import time

# åˆ›å»ºæ¸¸æˆå®ä¾‹
game = Game()


class Ball(Sprite):

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        
    @as_main
    def main1(self):
        while True:
            self.turn_left(10)
            self.move(10)
            yield 100
            self.clone()

    @as_clones  
    def clones1(self):
        while True:
            self.turn_right(10)
            self.move(100)
            self.change_color_random()
            yield 1000

    @handle_broadcast("event")
    def event1(self):
        self.say("hello")


# å®šä¹‰åœºæ™¯
class MyScene(Scene):

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

        # æ·»åŠ ç²¾çµ
        ball = Ball()
        self.add_sprite(ball)

    def main(self):
        while True:
            # æ·»åŠ ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿ
            explosion = ParticleSystem(400, 300)
            self.add_particles(explosion)  # æ·»åŠ ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿåˆ°åœºæ™¯
            self.broadcast("event")
            yield 3000


# è¿è¡Œæ¸¸æˆ
game.set_scene(MyScene())
game.run()

from scrawl import Game, Scene, Sprite, Cat, as_main

# åˆ›å»ºæ¸¸æˆå®ä¾‹

class MyCat(Cat):

            self.walk()
            yield 500
            

# å®šä¹‰åœºæ™¯

from scrawl import *
import time

# åˆ›å»ºæ¸¸æˆå®ä¾‹
game = Game()


class Ball(Sprite):

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        
    @as_main
    def main1(self):
        while True:
            self.turn_left(10)
            self.move(10)
            yield 100
            self.clone()

    @as_clones  
    def clones1(self):
        while True:
            self.turn_right(10)
            self.move(100)
            self.change_color_random()
            yield 1000

    @handle_broadcast("event")
    def event1(self):
        self.say("hello")


# å®šä¹‰åœºæ™¯
class MyScene(Scene):

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

        # æ·»åŠ ç²¾çµ
        ball = Ball()
        self.add_sprite(ball)

    def main(self):
        while True:
            # æ·»åŠ ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿ
            explosion = ParticleSystem(400, 300)
            self.add_particles(explosion)  # æ·»åŠ ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿåˆ°åœºæ™¯
            self.broadcast("event")
            yield 3000


# è¿è¡Œæ¸¸æˆ
game.set_scene(MyScene())
game.run()

import { Pipeline } from "@astack-tech/core";
import { Agent } from "@astack-tech/components";
import { Deepseek } from "@astack-tech/integrations/model-provider";
import { PromptTemplate } from "@astack-tech/components";

// Create a simple pipeline with components
const pipeline = new Pipeline();

// Add components to the pipeline
pipeline.addComponent('template', new PromptTemplate({
  template: "Answer this question: {{question}}"
}));
pipeline.addComponent('model', new Deepseek({
  apiKey: process.env.DEEPSEEK_API_KEY,
  model: "deepseek-chat"
}));
pipeline.addComponent('agent', new Agent());

// Run the pipeline
const response = await pipeline.run('template.input', {
  question: "What is functional programming?"
});

console.log(response);

author: mickewn
content:
The Spire.XLS MCP Server is a robust solution that empowers AI agents to work with Excel files using the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It is totally independent and doesn't require Microsoft Office to be installed on system. This tool enables AI agents to create, read, modify, and convert Excel workbooks seamlessly

title: ã€å·¥å…·è‡ªèã€‘financial_indicators æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨ Rust ç¼–å†™çš„é‡‘èæŠ€æœ¯æŒ‡æ ‡åº“,å¯ç”¨äºåŠ å¯†è´§å¸ï¼Œè‚¡ç¥¨å¸‚åœºæŠ€æœ¯åˆ†æ
author: rosendolu
html:
financial_indicators æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨ Rust ç¼–å†™çš„é‡‘èæŠ€æœ¯æŒ‡æ ‡åº“ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºåŠ å¯†è´§å¸å’Œè‚¡ç¥¨ç­‰é‡‘èå¸‚åœºçš„æŠ€æœ¯åˆ†æã€‚è¯¥åº“æ¶µç›–äº†ä¸»æµçš„è¶‹åŠ¿ã€åŠ¨é‡ã€æ³¢åŠ¨ç‡ã€æˆäº¤é‡ç­‰å¤šç§å¸¸ç”¨æŒ‡æ ‡ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ä½†ä¸é™äº

  1. MA
  2. EMA
  3. MACD
  4. KDJ
  5. RSI
  6. Bollinger Bands
  7. ATR
  8. OBV
  9. VWAP
  10. ...

install

cargo add financial_indicators

example

use financial_indicators::kdj::KDJ;

fn main() {
    let highs = vec![11.0, 12.0, 13.0, 14.0, 15.0, 16.0];
    let lows = vec![10.0, 9.0, 8.0, 7.0, 6.0, 5.0];
    let closes = vec![10.5, 11.0, 12.0, 13.0, 14.0, 15.0];
    let period = 3;
    let kdj_values = KDJ::new(&highs, &lows, &closes, period);
    println!("KDJ Values for the given period:");
    for (i, kdj) in kdj_values.iter().enumerate() {
        println!(
            "Period {}: K: {:.2}, D: {:.2}, J: {:.2}",
            i + 1,
            kdj.k,
            kdj.d,
            kdj.j
        );
    }
}

title: ã€å¼€æºæ¨èã€‘ç”¨æ¥ç»™å¤§æ¨¡å‹ç”Ÿæˆå¯è§†åŒ–å›¾è¡¨çš„ MCPï¼Œå…è´¹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ 15+ å›¾è¡¨
author: hustcc
html:
åœ°å€ï¼šhttps://github.com/antvis/mcp-server-chart

MCP Server Chart

A Model Context Protocol server for generating charts using AntV.

This is a TypeScript-based MCP server that provides chart generation capabilities. It allows you to create various types of charts through MCP tools.

åŸºäº AntV å¯è§†åŒ–è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆå°è£…çš„å¯è§†åŒ–å›¾è¡¨ç”Ÿæˆ MCP æ’ä»¶ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ 15+ å¸¸ç”¨å¯è§†åŒ–å›¾è¡¨ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ MCP å·¥å…·åˆ›å»ºå„ç§ç±»å‹çš„å›¾è¡¨ã€‚

âœ¨ Features

Now 15+ charts supported.

  • generate_area_chart - Generate a area chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_bar_chart - Generate a bar chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_column_chart - Generate a column chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_dual_axes_chart - Generate a dual-axes chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_fishbone_diagram - Generate a fishbone-diagram chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_flow_diagram - Generate a flow-diagram chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_histogram_chart - Generate a histogram chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_line_chart - Generate a line chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_mind_map - Generate a mind-map chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_network_graph - Generate a network-graph chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_pie_chart - Generate a pie chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_radar_chart - Generate a radar chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_scatter_chart - Generate a scatter chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_treemap_chart - Generate a treemap chart, and return an image URL.
  • generate_word_cloud_chart - Generate a word-cloud chart, and return an image URL.

ğŸ¤– Usage

To use with Desktop APP, such as Claude, VSCode, Cline, Cherry Studio, and so on, add the MCP server config below. On Mac system:

{
  "mcpServers": {
    "mcp-server-chart": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": [
        "-y",
        "@antv/mcp-server-chart"
      ]
    }
  }
}

On Window system:

{
  "mcpServers": {
    "mcp-server-chart": {
      "command": "cmd",
      "args": [
        "/c",
        "npx",
        "-y",
        "@antv/mcp-server-chart"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Also, you can use it on aliyun, modelscope, glama.ai, smithery.ai or others with HTTP, SSE Protocol.

ğŸ“  Private Deployment

MCP Server Chart provides a free chart generation service by default. For users with a need for private deployment, they can try using VIS_REQUEST_SERVER to customize their own chart generation service.

{
  "mcpServers": {
    "mcp-server-chart": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": [
        "-y",
        "@antv/mcp-server-chart"
      ],
      "env": {
        "VIS_REQUEST_SERVER": "<YOUR_VIS_REQUEST_SERVER>"
      }
    }
  }
}

You can use AntV's project GPT-Vis-SSR to deploy an HTTP service in a private environment, and then pass the URL address through env VIS_REQUEST_SERVER.

ğŸ”¨ Development

Install dependencies:

npm install

Build the server:

npm run build

Start the MCP server:

npm run start

ğŸ“„ License

MIT@AntV.

Haiku Generator - Free AI Haiku Maker & Creator for Beautiful Poems
Create perfect 5-7-5 haiku poems with our AI-powered Haiku Generator. Free, no login required. The best haiku maker and creator for traditional poetry online.
website link: https://www.haiku-generator.com/

What is a Haiku Poem?
A haiku is a concise Japanese poem capturing a moment or scene with a 5-7-5 syllable structure, often focusing on nature and seasons. These traditional short Japanese poems offer a poetic snapshot that resonates with readers.
How to Create Haiku Poems Online with Free AI Haiku Maker
Our AI-powered haiku generator simplifies creating traditional 5-7-5 haikus based on your input, making it engaging for both poets and enthusiasts. Use this AI haiku maker to explore and write a haiku, experiencing the art of Japanese poetry online.
Experience the Haiku Generator for Free
Our free haiku generator lets you experiment with themes and words without any cost, making haiku writing accessible to everyone. Try our online haiku maker to create beautiful poems, generating unique Japanese poetry effortlessly.
The Benefits of Using an AI Haiku Generator
Our AI haiku generator enhances your writing by adhering to traditional formats and inspiring creativity. Suitable for beginners looking to learn haiku poetry and experienced poets seeking a creative tool. Generate haikus online today and explore the beauty of Japanese poetry.
Features of the Haiku Generator
Our haiku generator at haiku-generator.com offers several features to enhance your haiku writing experience:

Syllable Counting: Ensures 5-7-5 format for your Japanese haiku poems.
Synonym Suggestions: Helps find the perfect words for your haiku.
Creative Prompts: Inspires haiku creation with fresh ideas.
Multiple Haikus: Generate multiple haikus to explore various themes and styles using our haiku generator tool.
Enhance Your Haiku with Strategic Keywords
Choose impactful keywords to craft compelling haikus:

Theme/Emotion: Reflect the haiku's sentiment with keywords like "tranquil forest" or "whispering wind."
Contrast/Combination: Create dynamic imagery with pairs like "frosty silence" and "dawn chorus."
Visual/Sensory Stimuli: Engage readers' senses with "golden sunset" or "gentle raindrops."
By integrating these methods, you can create a haiku that is not only structurally sound but also rich in imagery and emotion. This approach will help your haiku stand out and leave a lasting impression on readers.

title: ã€å·¥å…·è‡ªèã€‘aighibliimage.com An AI-powered Ghibli-style image conversion tool
author: zhxsinc
content:
Basic Information

Website Name: AI Ghibli Image
Website Domain: AI Ghibli Image


Introduction
One-line Description
A professional AI-powered Ghibli-style image conversion tool that instantly transforms your photos into magical scenes reminiscent of Miyazaki films.
Extended Description
AI Ghibli Image is a leading artificial intelligence image conversion tool dedicated to transforming ordinary photos into the unique artistic style of Studio Ghibli. Our platform combines advanced AI technology with a deep understanding of Ghibli artistry to provide users with a simple yet powerful image conversion experience. Whether you're a devoted Ghibli film fan or a designer seeking creative inspiration, our tool helps you create artwork filled with dreamlike warmth. Through multiple Ghibli sub-style options, users can convert photos into artistic styles from classic films like "Spirited Away" and "My Neighbor Totoro", creating truly unique visual experiences.
Core Features
Image Conversion Engine

Support for multiple image formats (JPG, PNG, WEBP, etc.)
Multiple Ghibli sub-style options (e.g., "Spirited Away" style, "Totoro" style)
Custom parameter adjustments (style intensity, color saturation, etc.)
Real-time preview of conversion effects
html:
Basic Information

  • Website Name: AI Ghibli Image
  • Website Domain: AI Ghibli Image

Introduction

One-line Description

A professional AI-powered Ghibli-style image conversion tool that instantly transforms your photos into magical scenes reminiscent of Miyazaki films.

Extended Description

AI Ghibli Image is a leading artificial intelligence image conversion tool dedicated to transforming ordinary photos into the unique artistic style of Studio Ghibli. Our platform combines advanced AI technology with a deep understanding of Ghibli artistry to provide users with a simple yet powerful image conversion experience. Whether you're a devoted Ghibli film fan or a designer seeking creative inspiration, our tool helps you create artwork filled with dreamlike warmth. Through multiple Ghibli sub-style options, users can convert photos into artistic styles from classic films like "Spirited Away" and "My Neighbor Totoro", creating truly unique visual experiences.

Core Features

Image Conversion Engine

  • Support for multiple image formats (JPG, PNG, WEBP, etc.)
  • Multiple Ghibli sub-style options (e.g., "Spirited Away" style, "Totoro" style)
  • Custom parameter adjustments (style intensity, color saturation, etc.)
  • Real-time preview of conversion effects

æä¾›çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨çš„å­˜å‚¨åç«¯ï¼šRedisï¼ˆåŸºäº Lua å®ç°é™æµç®—æ³•ï¼‰ã€å†…å­˜ï¼ˆåŸºäº threading.RLockï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Key è¿‡æœŸæ·˜æ±°ï¼‰ã€‚
æ”¯æŒå¤šç§é™æµç®—æ³•ï¼šå›ºå®šçª—å£ã€æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£ã€ä»¤ç‰Œæ¡¶ã€æ¼æ¡¶ & é€šç”¨ä¿¡å…ƒé€Ÿç‡ç®—æ³•ï¼ˆGeneric Cell Rate Algorithm, GCRAï¼‰ã€‚

from throttled import RateLimiterType, Throttled, rate_limter, store, utils

    # ğŸ’§ æ¶ˆè€— Key=/ping çš„ä¸€ä¸ª Tokenã€‚
